Ya! Thanks for the nicely isolated bug report!

Looks like a (non flow sensitive) variable inlining bug.

After function inliner put down var _uid = uid = Math.random(), it might have gotten a bit too aggressive assuming _uid being replaceable by uid.
I have a patch that is currently in review. It should be fixed in the next release.
This issue was closed by revision 0123fd5303c8.
